attributes.title: Calvert Eats Local/Holly's Food Map
attributes.description:
Created on May 24, 2011 by hbudd on Sourcemap.org:

I am a member of Calvert  Eats Local, a citizen organization dedicated to the support of sustainable agriculture and community in Southern Maryland.

A community that educates and enlightens members on ways to find, grow, prepare, and serve food and drink that is truly local and truly sustainable.

Where do the foods I eat come from? How do they get to me?This is a map of food that I source locally. I will be adding more.   I hope this map can be an inspiration and a help to others eating local food.
